name: Tall Nature of East
description: Secluded lands with dark woods and high mountains. Considered to be area of evil alignment characters, war criminals, poiseners, thiefs. Nevertheless, rich with crafts like: jewelry, textile, etc.

name: High roads
description: Area between north and south. Famous for Silver Castle and its bridge. Travellers have been using its roads forever. Known for trade, merchants and guilds. Lays on particularly high cliffs.
ruler: Fellowship of merchants and Fighters guild
